text_7: and wants to start his own business. Our task is to do everything necessary so that you can focus on the implementation of your idea without wasting time, energy and money on the bureaucracy associated with opening and running your company.
text_8: The fund works according to the umbrella company system. We are a strong protection and support for specialists in completely different fields and existing entrepreneurs. Our foundation is happy to share its knowledge and all the necessary tools that help to realize a business idea, doing it easily, safely and in the legal field.
text_9: We are confident that we can surprise you with the efficiency of our work. All formalities related to opening a business are resolved within one working day. After that, every entrepreneur can legally conduct his business.
text_12: If you did not find yourself in this list - do not rush to get upset, feel free to write to us, we will be happy to help and select an individual way of cooperation.
